page.title: 02May Queen
page.content: Mitcham is well known for the May Queen.I am in the May Queen I started when I was 5 and I was a fairy for a year and then I was a Lily of the Valley which is a green ribbon with a white dress and green flowers to hold and to wear in your hair. When you are 12 you go in a pick to be the May Queen but if you are not it then you are Prince Charming or Lady in Waiting if you are not that then its your last year. They have a little fancy dress for the little boys and the May Queen has all different colours. We visit all different places and we go to old peoples homes and we take part in the Mitcham Carnival.I am the Lavender Lady this year.The Mayor comes and crowns the new queen every year. {Katie Mayers.
